titleStmt.title: The case and circumstances of paper-making in England truly stated And by the paper-sellers humbly offered to the consideration of this present Parliament, as reasons against the passing of a bill, intituled An act for the encouragement and better establishing the making of white-writing and printing-paper. The same being misrepresented in a paper stiled, The case of the Company of White-Paper-makers.
titleStmt.author: Company of White Paper Makers (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
